# Version 1.0.99.2-prerelease - `<–°–ø–∞—Å–∏–±–∞ –¥–µ–≥—Ä–∞–¥–∫–∞>`

* 18 Apr 2022  
* Release for Kerbal Space Program [KSP 1.12.x]

<div style="border:0.5px solid Tomato; background-color: #bada55; color: #FF0000; text-align:center"><h4>
<b>DO A CLEAN INSTALL:</br> DELETE EXISTING INSTALLATION THEN RE-INSTALL</b></h4><p>Download from <a href="https://www.curseforge.com/kerbal/ksp-mods/MOD_NAME/files">CurseForge</a></p></div>

## Version Changes

### Localization üóÉÔ∏è

## Update

* docs/

## Localization

Not So SimpleConstruction! (NSSC) uses localization files provided by:

### [Extraplanetary Launchpads](https://github.com/taniwha/Extraplanetary-Launchpads)

>* ![English Flag][EN] English
>* ![Chinese Flag][CN] Chinese (ÁÆÄ‰Ωì‰∏≠Êñá)
>* ***your translation here***
>
>Kindly help translate [@`taniwha's][taniwha] [Github Repo](https://github.com/taniwha/Extraplanetary-Launchpads). See above for instructions.
